TopicTitle: The Martian - trailer now out. May contain spoilers.

Articles.Content: Looks more promising than I thought it would and the external shots of *Hermes* are excellent. Actually it looks quite similar to a couple of RSS ships I've seen on these forums. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
